IssueHistory.Comment: Change the calendar buttons to rollover labels. Also add a time button popup.

jklkjlk lkjlkjkllkjlk klkj
lkjjk kljlkj kljlkj lkjlkj
Need to change calendar popup to use rollovers. Also need to add a time popup
The menu says "Registration" Wierd data exists under Menus Add language and locale to grid screen |main|language|locale Add DialogBundle and MenuResources_es to file. Fix Espan*l to use unicoding.
Test the apache and tomcat versions - Also look at Apache Slide
Test it .vs. WebDAV
Test with: - Apache - tomcat 5 - sessiond - webmail - groupware

Need utilities to: 1. Open and display an XSD file as a tree 2. Open and validate an XML for the XSD 3. Send the XML to a WebService
4. Receive an XML as a WebService 5. Validate and display the XML received

The calendar blows up when a null start date is found. Should handle it is follows (set method): - Ignore null date items - Set date to calendar first date - Set date to today. Also: Rounded corners on highlighed entries Also: Darker outline on calendar entries Also: Get rid of the code in ProjectTaskCalendar/addListeners().
When I do this, it displays ALL detail, rather than a new blank detail list. See bug entry: Enter a new bug and immediately click on "Detail"
Move this: JavaButton BaseScanListener picture.manual picture.remote program.db.??? ScreenTest2
Immediately validate and redisplay on every change. Especially the date popup button (should immediately change dates)
